definition: a constantly changing pattern or sequence of elements
sentence: Her emotions were a kaleidoscope of joy and sadness.
The rambunctious children played joyfully in the park.
They aimed to yoke their efforts to achieve a common goal.
His bromidic remarks failed to inspire the audience.
His klutzy movements often led to accidents.
The obstreperous crowd made it hard for the speakers to be heard.

definition: to make a disease or its symptoms less severe without removing the cause
sentence: The medication did little to palliate his pain.

definition: to regard with great respect; revere
sentence: Many cultures venerate their ancestors and honor their legacies.

definition: adapted to a very dry environment
sentence: Cacti are xerophytic plants that thrive in arid climates.

definition: To think deeply about something; to ponder.
sentence: He needed time to cogitate over the implications of his decision.
